title: "Artificial intelligence hiring levels in pharma rose to a year-high in January 2022"
excerpt: "The proportion of pharmaceutical companies hiring for artificial intelligence related positions rose significantly in January 2022 compared with the equivalent month last year, with 43.9% of the companies included in our analysis recruiting for at least one such position."
